test-case.name: JAxes-320
test-case.description: Use type tests - enum

test-case.description: Use type tests - enum

test-case.description: Use type tests - enum

test-case.name: JAxes-323
test-case.description: Use type tests - enum

test-case.name: JAxes-324
test-case.description: Use type tests - array with record(enum)
test-case.test: let $array := [{"x": "red", "y": "green"}, {"x": "pink", "y": "teal"}] return $array/jnode(*, record(x as enum("red"), *))/y => string()

test-case.name: JAxes-325
test-case.description: Use type tests - array with XNode

test-case.name: JAxes-326
test-case.description: Use type tests - array with XNode

test-case.name: JAxes-327
test-case.description: Use type tests - item()
test-case.test: let $array := [1, xs:date('2002-02-02'), #xml:space, contains#2, {}] return count($array/jnode(*, item()))

test-case.name: JAxes-328
test-case.description: Use type tests - child::item()
test-case.test: let $array := [1, xs:date('2002-02-02'), #xml:space, contains#2, {}] return count($array/child::jnode(*, item()))

test-case.name: JAxes-329
test-case.description: Use type tests - jnode(*, item()?)
test-case.test: let $array := [1, (), xs:date('2002-02-02'), #xml:space, contains#2, (3,4,5)] return count($array/jnode(*, item()?))

test-case.name: JAxes-330
test-case.description: Use type tests - jnode()
test-case.test: let $array := [1, xs:date('2002-02-02'), #xml:space, contains#2, {}, jtree([])] return count($array/jnode())

test-case.name: JAxes-331
test-case.description: Use type tests - child::jnode()
test-case.test: let $array := [1, xs:date('2002-02-02'), #xml:space, contains#2, {}] return count($array/child::jnode(*, xs:date))

test-case.name: JAxes-332
test-case.description: Use type tests - gnode()

test-case.name: JAxes-333
test-case.description: Use type tests - child::gnode()

test-case.name: JAxes-334
test-case.description: Use type tests - child::jnode(*, gnode()?)
test-case.test: let $array := [1, (), jtree([]), parse-xml("<doc/>"), ([], [])] return count($array/child::jnode(*, gnode()?))
